column4: When I play movies there is flickering how can I solve that ?
Do you have a Video Card driver enabled?
Enough RAM?
: The video card should be installed as I can see the desktop and colors
I'm talking about the drivers. You may have a generic software driver but if you use one specific to your card, you
how can I check that ?
open a terminal and enter glxinfo | grep direct
direct rendering : Yes
Interesting. lspci -nn | grep -i vga   please
ATI Technologies Inc RS690M [Radeon X1 200 Series] [1002:79lf]
Do you know where the Hardware Drivers dialog is?
I dont know
System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers
Searching for available drivers // No proprietary drivers are in use on this system
you asked me to go to hardware ... I went and the message is : Searching for available drivers // No proprietary drivers are in use on this system
Okay.
I didn't see your response.
: no problem
Please upload /var/log/Xorg.0.log
Well you can view the output with  cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | less
